channel.title: Lau Siaw Young - Articles

item.title: On receiving advice
item.description: Itâ€™s hard to evaluate the advice you receive about making a decision without any a priori experience with the choices. How do you even begin to process the information you have been given?

item.title: Immaculate Showcase
item.description: This is an example post showcasing the various features of Immaculate and Tufte CSS. Refer to the Markdown source of this post for a better understanding!
